text: Arau smarana karaa juna-nunaka, yetiya te'om kraodha arasthata guci gaichila arau dharana karaichila ye, ami te'omka nadharaima. Tara pichata te'om andhakarara paraa ahbana karai kaichila ye, â€˜tomara bahirae ana kono satya ilaha na'i, tumi paraitra mahana, niscaya ma'i an'yaya karaichiloâ€™
